title: Bright: Samurai Soul
short_cast: Yuki Nomura, Daisuke Hirakawa, Shion Wakayama, Miyavi, Maaya Sakamoto, Kenjiro Tsuda, Chafurin, Mamoru Miyano, Kenichi Suzumura, Simu Liu, Fred Mancuso, Yuzu Harada
cast: Yuki Nomura, Daisuke Hirakawa, Shion Wakayama, Miyavi, Maaya Sakamoto, Kenjiro Tsuda, Chafurin, Mamoru Miyano, Kenichi Suzumura, Simu Liu, Fred Mancuso, Yuzu Harada
genre: Japanese, Action Anime, Sci-Fi & Fantasy Anime, Anime Features, Action & Adventure
desc: In the early years of Japan's Meiji Restoration, a human ronin must unite with an orc assassin to save an elf orphan from their common adversary.
